goal.en: "1. To understand the complexity of gene regulation . 2. The relationship of RNA and gene regulation . 3. Progress of Modern RNA regulation."
goal.ch: 讓學生:1. 了解基因調控之複雜度。2. RNA與基因調控之關係。3. 近代RNA調控的進展。

content.en:
"探討 mRNA 的穩定度
1. Gene transcription
2. Transcription control
3. post-transcriptional control
4. mRNA adenylation and pol y-A signal
5. deadenylation and mRNA stability
6. Deadenylase
7. RNA silencing
8. RNA interferance
9. Gene expression and mRNA stability"
content.ch:
"探討 mRNA 的穩定度
1. Gene transcription
2. Transcription control
3. post-transcriptional control
4. mRNA adenylation and pol y-A signal
5. deadenylation and mRNA stability
6. Deadenylase
7. RNA silencing
8. RNA interferance
9. Gene expression and mRNA stability"

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

domain.en: 進階學科 、 農業應用
domain.ch: 進階學科 、 農業應用

en: Department:MSc in Life Science、PhD in Life Science only.
Department:Department of Life Sciences only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.

系所:限生命科學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
